about

A good design is a combination of creativity and the art of editing, this set of widely used and essential icons will help you manifest this in your designs. Especially if you are a UI designer.

360 icons

The set contains 90 icons with 4 different styles for each, which makes them 360 icons in total. Neat and clear shapes, at your fingertips! One click is all it takes.

formats

Different formats & features at your disposal

  • Free icons library.
  • 360 Icons (90 icons × 4 styles).
  • 4 Styles (light, regular, bold, filled).
  • Support (fig, xd, ai, eps, svg, pdf, png).
  • 24 x 24px Grid size.
  • Clean & smooth.
